com.ca.mas.core.error

Class MAGServerException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.ca.mas.core.error.MAGServerException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthenticationException, ClientCredentialsServerException, MASServerException, OAuthServerException, OtpException, RegistrationServerException

    public class MAGServerException
extends java.lang.Exception
    The Base Exception class for MAG Server communication, thrown when an error occurs while accessing the MAG Server endpoint
    See Also:
